text: @NYGovCuomo @NYGovCuomo ADMITTED there was a stockpile ventilators in storage &claims “they didn’t need them yet” but yet at the same time he was screaming NY didn’t have enough? Why not use the thousands you had plus thousands you got before you take more?! #COVID19 https://t.co/gk0v80tTQ4
